options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit

options.title: -n STRING
options.description: the length of STRING is nonzero

options.title: -z STRING
options.description: the length of STRING is zero

options.title: -b FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is block special

options.title: -c FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is character special

options.title: -d FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is a directory

options.title: -e FILE
options.description: FILE exists

options.title: -f FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is a regular file

options.title: -g FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is set-group-ID

options.title: -G FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is owned by the effective group ID

options.title: -h FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is a symbolic link (same as -L)

options.title: -k FILE
options.description: FILE exists and has its sticky bit set

options.title: -L FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is a symbolic link (same as -h)

options.title: -N FILE
options.description: FILE exists and has been modified since it was last read

options.title: -O FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is owned by the effective user ID

options.title: -p FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is a named pipe

options.title: -r FILE
options.description: FILE exists and read permission is granted

options.title: -s FILE
options.description: FILE exists and has a size greater than zero

options.title: -S FILE
options.description: FILE exists and is a socket

options.title: -t FD
options.description: file descriptor FD is opened on a terminal

options.title: -u FILE
options.description: FILE exists and its set-user-ID bit is set

options.title: -w FILE
options.description: FILE exists and write permission is granted

options.title: -x FILE
options.description: FILE exists and execute (or search) permission is granted
